categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic corps

nodes.text: The flame trooper corps was a corps in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems that consisted of clone flametroopers. Initially, clone flametroopers were outfitted with MK I insulated armor, but was severely flawed in that it didn't have sufficient respirator filtration. When the problem was quickly fixed in the MK II "Hotspot" Insulated Armor, it provided a morale boost to the flame trooper corps. Members of the flame trooper corps participated in the Second Battle of Geonosis, where they served under Clone Commander CC-1993 "Jet" alongside special ops clone troopers.
